amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding in the Departmental Administration account by $1 million for environmental justice activities and to reduce funding in the Weapons Activities account by $1.2 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds in the Departmental Administration account by $1,000,000 and reduce funds in the Weapons Activities account by $1,200,000.

action.text: Amendment (A031) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 238 (Roll no. 331).
